channel.title: Paul McCartney on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Paul McCartney Documentary ‘Man on the Run’ Picked Up by Amazon MGM Ahead of Telluride Debut (Exclusive)
item.description: Morgan Neville, who previously directed ‘20 Feet from Stardom’ and last year’s ‘Piece by Piece,’ chronicles McCartney’s post-Beatles 1970s era.

item.title: Sir Paul McCartney Returns to North America: Where to Buy Sold-Out Got Back Tour 2025 Tickets Online
item.description: After going on sale on July 18, many dates immediately sold out for the music icon’s 2025 North American tour — find THR’s exclusive promo codes here.

item.title: Rob Reiner Teases Paul McCartney, Elton John Cameos in ‘Spinal Tap II’
item.description: The sequel to the 1984 cult classic ‘This Is Spinal Tap’ hits theaters in September.
